title: 22A Review Quiz
question:
Write a C++ function called PrintMyName that prints your name on the console several times. The function must be defined as follows:

  • The function takes two parameters, count and n
  • count - Indicates the number of times to print your name
  • n - A number less than count. On the nth iteration, instead of printing your name, print the string "Hello 22B"
  • The result of the function is the sum of count and n.

In the main() function, write a single line of code that calls the function and assigns the result to a variable called sum.
